archimate:Requirement.name: OneRoster
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Sharing class rosters and related data between a student information system (SIS) and any other system, typically a content application or learning information system (LMS).

properties.value: The OneRoster standard supports spreadsheet-style (CSV) export-import as well as direct system exchanges using REST API's. With OneRoster, schools pave the way for digital resources for teaching and learning and eliminate problems before they happen.
